explains: n. 入迷，着迷；魅力，令人着迷的事物

sentences.en: Some people have a morbid fascination with crime.
sentences.cn: 有些人对犯罪有种病态的迷恋。

sentences.en: The girls listened in fascination as the story unfolded.
sentences.cn: 故事情节逐渐展开，小女孩都入迷地听着。

sentences.en: He had a fascination for submarines and joined this branch of the service.
sentences.cn: 他迷恋潜艇并加入了海军的这个分支。
